${ModID}:FriendSentry.NAME: Friendly Sentry
${ModID}:FriendSentry.FLAVOR: "The answer? Use a laser. And if that don't work...use more lasers." - The Architect
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of odd turns, shuffle an #yInsight into your discard pile. At the start of even turns, deal #b%s damage to the enemy with the lowest HP.
